channel.title: CVE Feed for WWBN -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WWBN -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-50172|2024-01-12T17:23:11.253Z -- wwbn -- avideo
item.description: A recovery notification bypass vulnerability exists in the userRecoverPass.php captcha validation functionality of WWBN AVideo dev master commit 15fed957fb. A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to the silent creation of a recovery pass code for any user.
